src:
Di Mata Schmeichel, Serendah Inilah Kualitas Skuat Manchester United
04 Nov 2019, 16:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Legenda Manchester United Peter Schmeichel menyebut kualitas skuat Setan Merah saat ini cuma medioker dan etos kerjanya juga payah.
Skuat Setan Merah kembali tampil inkonsisten pada musim ini. Setelah sempat ambyar, United tampak berhasil bangkit usai menahan imbang Liverpool dengan performa yang bisa dibilang impresif.
Setelah itu, skuat asuhan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer itu berhasil memenangi tiga laga tandangnya secara beruntun di semua ajang kompetisi.
Akan tetapi tren positif itu terhenti ketika United bersua dengan Bournemouth pada laga pekan ke-11 Premier League akhir pekan kemarin. Mereka dikalahkan oleh Joshua King dkk dengan skor 1-0.
text:
In Schmeichel's eyes, this is as low as the quality of Manchester United's squad
Nov 04 2019, 16:59 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United legend Peter Schmeichel said the quality of the Red Devils squad is currently only mediocre and the work ethic is also lousy.
Red Devils squad again appear inconsistent this season. After being ambiguous, United appeared to have managed to rise after a draw against Liverpool with a performance that could be considered impressive.
After that, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's squad managed to win three consecutive away games in all competitions.
However, the positive trend was stopped when United met with Bournemouth in the Week 11 Premier League match last weekend. They were defeated by Joshua King et al with a score of 1-0.
